message: ...When I open my eyes, the first thing I see is a gas mask.
Then Koujaku's smiling face appears. Behind him, I see a white ceiling.
Koujaku helps me sit up, then points with his thumb over his shoulder.
Noiz and Mink are leaning against the wall a few paces away.
Those Morphine guys really beat the crap out of me...
Looking around, I realize I'm not in the lab anymore.
This room is much smaller and filled with shelves. It must be some kind of storage room.

name: 紅雀
message: "You remember the passage that connects the Old Residential District to Platinum Jail?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Noiz spoofed the gates to get us in."

name: ノイズ
message: "There's a lotta hackers who reverse-engineer Platinum Jail IDs. It's hard, so the money's good."

name: ノイズ
message: "I bought some throwaway creds, fixed 'em up a little. Only works once, but that was enough to get us in."

name: 紅雀
message: "Now we just have to find that Toue fucker and bash his fucking face―woah?!"

name: クリア
message: "I was so worried! It was awful, Master!"
Clear wraps his arms around me, squeezing tight.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, get off! Can't you see he's hurt?!"
It feels nice to laugh again.
It's like a great weight has lifted from my shoulders.
Clear is looking around like he's trying to find something.

name: クリア
message: "Where's Ren? I don't see him anywhere..."
Koujaku frowns when he sees my expression.
As I'm trying to find the right words to explain... my bag starts to squirm.
